page.title: 17POPULATION OF BROMPTON
page.content: The total population of Brompton according to the 1981 Census figures was 2,046.The largest groups being the 20_24 year olds(163 persons)and the 25_29 year olds(175 persons).An increase in population recently resulted from over 60 new houses being built by a housing association in conjunction with the District Council. These houses are rented together with 211 other council properties in the village.There are however 414 private homes & the largest social group in the village is made up from the professional classes.One quarter of the population of Brompton is over retirement age living in a total of 214 households,93 households are owner occupied,121 are rented.186 pensioners live alone with the oldest resident being Miss Nicholson who is 91.
